purpose: Provide educational resources and practical examples for using LLMs like GPT-3 and frameworks like LangChain.
principle: Utilizes Python scripts and Jupyter Notebooks to demonstrate the integration and application of LLMs with various libraries and APIs.
reusability: Includes modular scripts and notebooks that can be adapted for different LLM use cases, with examples of integration with external APIs like OpenAI and Pinecone.
limitations: Primarily focused on educational purposes; may not be optimized for production environments.
name: llm-python
description: Large Language Models (LLMs) tutorials & sample scripts, ft. langchain, openai, llamaindex, gpt, chromadb & pinecone
highlight: Comprehensive tutorials and sample scripts for working with various Large Language Models and tools.
